name: Cosmic Castaway
description:
Gameplay
A point-and-click adventure game in which a wayward astronaut finds himself stranded on a strange asteroid.

In order to get off of the asteroid and make his way home, the astronaut must explore the alien land and use the resources he finds to fix his ship.

Credits:
Josh Haberman
Alain Bellemare
Andrea Woodford
Steven Woodford

Created at TOJam: Don't Stop bELEVEN
